title: cannot compile gccgo, got error: conflicting types for ‘malloc’
body:
by **mebibou**: 
Hi everyone,

When trying to install the gccgo compiler, and after 4 hours, I have the following error:

In file included from ../../../gccgo/libgo/runtime/go-go.c:12:0:
../../../gccgo/libgo/runtime/runtime.h:90:7: error: conflicting types for ‘malloc’
make[3]: *** [go-go.lo] Error 1
make[2]: *** [all] Error 2
make[1]: *** [all-target-libgo] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2

I've already tried to google it, but only find one page in chineese ...

I think I should be more precise about the error, but I don't really know what to give
you with 
that.

Thanks in advance for the help
